channel.title: How to make a smoke bomb
channel.description:
For all you mini-terrorists out there i made a guide for smoke bombs
stuff needed
potassium nitrate (saltpeter) (ask for stump remover at lowes or home depot its like 100% saltpeter
picture of the stuff: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img205.imageshack.us/img205/1356/stumpremoverus6.jpg[/img][/URL]
sugar aluminum foil powdered organic dye(optional) baking soda (optional)
ok first put the saltpeter and sugar in a skillet or something like that MAKE SURE THERES MORE SALTPETER THEN SUGAR try a 3:2 ratio and put it on the stove at low stir the mixture with a spoon or fork using long strokes will dissolve and it will be a carmel or chocolate color now take it off the stove and add the powdered dye and a spoonful of baking soda and stir them in now put it on the aluminum foil and make it into a mod type thing now let it harden which should take about a5 minutes then your done! (make sure u take off the foil!) (note: for best results in terrorism a black powder center is awesome)
now light and have some fun stuff
Measurements 6 parts grams saltpeter (makes the fire/burning) 4 parts grams sugar (smoke but harder to light) 7 parts grams powdered organic dye (color purple is da best) about a tablespoon baking soda (this slows it down and makes less fire and more smoke)
EDIT: added pics and fixed some spelling and grammatical errors

item.title: How to make a smoke bomb
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:50, topic:134982”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=186400.msg2986427#msg2986427 date=1255021709]

I could never buy saltpeter. I will try in my new city, but back home everytime I asked they would laugh at me. I’ve wanted to do this for a long time. I wanna do a rediculously massive one on a calm day with no wind. I’ll use like over a pound of each ingredient.

There’s this age old myth that saltpeter was used on prison men’s penis to prevent them from getting erections so they couldn’t have gay sex.

Who doesn’t?

Anyway, adding to the gay sex part, that’s where sagging comes from. It was used in prison to advertise to the fact that you are open for gay sex.

Loved the smoke bomb, going to try this sometime

yeah nice fucking grave dig, by the way, sagging usually isn’t possible anymore because you wear jumpsuits.
faggot
[/quote]
Your calling him a faggot when your the one with the “moderated” icon? What moderator allowed you to post such silly comments.[/quote]

He was moderates 3 days after that post…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a smoke bomb

item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

Mopman:

Nope, the Potassium Nitrate is an oxidiser, ie it supplies a large amount of oxygen to the fire.

hmmm thats kool im getting pics for this shit now

item.title: How to make a smoke bomb
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“3.65 kilos, post:34, topic:134982”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=186400.msg1735711#msg1735711 date=1189127043]

wow now i can add Smoke bombs to my list of things i can make:

Tasers
Flash bangs
pipe bombs
Shrapnell bombs
Chemical bombs
and now smoke bombs

i wanna learn to make flash bangs they would be great witht he stuff i wanna do
[/quote]
Flash powder is legal to own in the US as long as you have less than two pounds of it.
First: http://www.metacafe.com/watch/710100/make_flash_powder_legally/
Then: http://www.metacafe.com/watch/737031/impact_flash_bombs/

As for the sugar and Saltpeter…I think the whole purpose of the sugar is too slow down the burn rate. Someone correct me if I’m wrong.[/quote]

that and carmelizing it holds it all together

Read full topic

wow now i can add Smoke bombs to my list of things i can make:

pipe bombs
Shrapnell bombs
Chemical bombs
and now smoke bombs

[/quote]

i wanna learn to make flash bangs they would be great witht he stuff i wanna do[/quote]
Flash powder is legal to own in the US as long as you have less than two pounds of it.
First: http://www.metacafe.com/watch/710100/make_flash_powder_legally/
Then: http://www.metacafe.com/watch/737031/impact_flash_bombs/
